channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken traffic lights, 18th April
item.description:
Traffic lights at this location are not working. I can see no justification for having lights at this location on a weekend. There are weekday works on going on the pavement but these are not providing any hazard for pedestrians or wheel chairs. Why have highways permitted this set of temporary traffic signals to be installed just 200m from the next ones outside the local co op for n the same road? These lights are a hazard in themselves.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 94 Parton Road, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerously uneven road surface on pedestrian crossing, 18th April
item.description:
The road surface on the pedestrian crossing between the Brewery and the NCP car park on St Margarets Road (A4017) at the junction with Dunalley St and Henrietta St is dangerously uneven, and is a trip hazard. Although it is on the highway, this should be assessed on the trip hazard standards for pavements. This is a busy road, and people have no option but to use pedestrian crossings, especially people who may be a little unsteady on their feet.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29 Henrietta Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Keep Clear notice at end of footpath in Fernleigh Crescent and ajacent to the open green space., 17th April
item.description:
This notice (as above) needs re-painting to stop vehicles from blocking footpath. Please treat it as urgent. Thanks. Hon. Alderman Les Godwin.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 36 Long Mynd Avenue, Up Hatherley

item.title: Flytipped plasterboard, buggy, chair and other rubbish, 17th April
item.description:
This seems to be an ongoing problem on this corner. 2 blue bins were not emptied as gad the wrong stuff in them which seems to have encouraged other rubbish to be picked up beside it. Living 2 doors down, I'm constantly having to walk my children past rubbish. The last chairs i reported were never collected and eventually i took them to the tip myself.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Stearman Road, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Metal Garage door and electrical equipment dumped in front garden, 16th April
item.description:
A metal garage door and an electrical item have been dumped in the front garden of a bungalow in South View Way Prestbury. This has happened at some time in the last 3 weeks or so.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 South View Way, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet
